Package request

Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • request.RequestManager
  • public class RequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The RequestManager class is responsible for handling request-related actions. allRequests is a map that maps usernames to all of their request objects. requestStatus is a map that maps request statuses to their request objects.
